name: fullstackpart3
description: The third part of the FullStackOpen course from the University of Helsinki

scripts.build:ui: if exist build rd /s /q build && cd ../FullStackCourse/part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod &&  xcopy build ../../../FullStackPart3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Maksim Ilmast
